channel.title: Os on xymeow's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Os on xymeow's blog

item.title: Scheduler Activations: Effective Kernel Support for the User-Level Management of Parallelism - my notes
item.description: Some notes taking from reading the paper ‘Scheduler Activations: Effective Kernel Support for the User-Level Management of Parallelism’.

item.title: Xen and the art of virtualization - my notes
item.description:
Some notes taking from reading the paper ‘Xen and the art of virtualization’.

Xen is an x86 virtual machine monitor allowing multiple commodity OSs to share conventional hardware in a safe and resource managed fashion.

item.title: The Singularity System - my notes
item.description: Some notes taking from reading the paper ‘The Singularity System’.
